event.title: Machine Learning Training in Chennai
event.description:
Nowadays, Machine Learning is used for numerous applications. In order to personalize each members feed Facebook uses machine learning. It is the study of mathematical models and algorithms that systems use to perform the specific task. It is used in applications of detection of network intruders, email filtering and computer vision. It is closely related to computational statistics, it helps to make predictions using computers. Candidates who wish to learn machine learning can approach can step into Machine Learning Course in Chennai . Highly skilled professionals teach you each and everything about machine learning. Use this opportunity and get your dream with good salary package.
Tags: Machine Learning course | Machine Learning course near me
event.address: 37F Velachery Main Road, Velachery,  Chennai - 600042 Tamil Nadu Next to Adyar Ananda Bhavan
